Detailed Description

BooleanCondition which can be set to TRUE manually and also by a timer which expires.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Initializes the condition with FALSE and sets the timeout period.

BOOLEAN TimeoutCondition::IsTimerExpired (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
TRUE if the expiring timer was the reason for setting the condition to TRUE.
